title: Authors and Citation
text: Graham H (2023). demsrc: Get remote URLs remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections. https://github.com/permian-global-research/demsrc/, https://permian-global-research.github.io/demsrc/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {demsrc: Get remote URLs for remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections},   author = {Hugh Graham},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/permian-global-research/demsrc/, https://permian-global-research.github.io/demsrc/}, }

what: Get remote URLs for remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections
title: Get remote URLs for remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections
text: goal demsrc return remote url sources global DEM products. now, main function mpc_dtm_src accesses collections via Microsoft Planetary Computer STAC catalog using {rstac} package

title: Get remote URLs for remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections
text: can install development version demsrc GitHub :

title: Get remote URLs for remote Digital Elevation Model (DEM) collections
text: Return URLs desired DEM collection.
code: library(demsrc) library(terra) #> terra 1.6.51   (mh <- mpc_dtm_src(c( -121.772, 45.321, -121.611, 45.419),                     collection = "alos-dem")) #> [1] "/vsicurl/https://ai4edataeuwest.blob.core.windows.net/alos-dem/AW3D30_global/ALPSMLC30_N045W122_DSM.tif"  plot(rast(mh)) library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.3, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE  nc_sf <- system.file("gpkg", "nc.gpkg", package = "sf") |>   read_sf()   mpc_dtm_src(nc_sf, collection = "cop-dem-glo-30") #>  [1] "/vsicurl/https://elevationeuwest.blob.core.windows.net/copernicus-dem/COP30_hh/Copernicus_DSM_COG_10_N36_00_W085_00_DEM.tif" #>  [2] "/vsicurl/https://elevationeuwest.blob.core.windows.net/copernicus-dem/COP30_hh/Copernicus_DSM_COG_10_N36_00_W084_00_DEM.tif" #>  [3] what:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src
title:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src
text: Get tile sources Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT v001 DTM using planetary computer STAC catalogue.

title:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src
code: mpc_dtm_src(   aoi,   collection = c("cop-dem-glo-30", "cop-dem-glo-90", "alos-dem", "nasadem"),   vsicurl = TRUE )

title:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src
text: aoi spatial extent can provided numeric bounding box using spatial object either terra, sf stars packages. collection : "cop-dem-glo-30", "cop-dem-glo-90", "alos-dem", "nasadem". vsicurl logical default TRUE. TRUE '/vsicurl/' prefix appended returned urls increases read speed gdal. see https://gdal.org/user/virtual_file_systems.html#vsicurl-http-https-ftp-files-random-access information.

title:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src
text: character vector url paths.

title:
Get the tile sources for Copernicus GLO-30, ALOS World 3D-30m, NASADEM HGT
v001 DTM using the planetary computer STAC catalogue. — mpc_dtm_src

what: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
title: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
text: Create rstac compatible search boundary box

title: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
code: rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for sf rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for sfc rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for stars rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for SpatRaster rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for SpatVector rstac_bbox(x)  # S3 method for numeric rstac_bbox(x)

title: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
text: x numeric (length 4) define spatial bounds STAC API query one following rspatial objects: sf, sfc, stars, SpatVector, SpatRaster

title: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
text: numeric length 4 defining xmin, ymin, xmax ymax coordinates search extent WGS84 (EPSG:4326).

title: Create an rstac compatible search boundary box — rstac_bbox
